Travel

A log of trips I've been on over the past few years.

2025

November – New York City, USA

Visited my cousin.

October – Mexico City, Mexico

Attended Formula 1, ate tacos, and hung out with my brother and cousin.

October – Dark Sky Barren Reserve, Muskoka, Canada

Camping trip with the boys.

September – Alliston, Ontario, Canada

Camping trip with friends.

September – Alliston, Ontario, Canada

Solo camping trip and completed a 13 km hike.

August – Mount Washington, New Hampshire, USA

Road trip to Mount Washington.

July – Italy (Naples, Rome, Pompeii, Capri, Sorrento)

Family trip exploring cities along the coast.

May – Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada

Trip with friends.

April – New York City, USA

Drove a car to NYC, flew home, and spent time with my cousin.

March – New York City, USA

Visited my cousin.

February – Ellicottville, New York, USA

Friends ski trip.

January – New York City, USA

Visited my cousin.

2024

November – Nashville, Tennessee & Panama City, Florida, USA

Road trip for Jacob’s Ironman event; stopped in Nashville for the bar scene.

August – Germany → France → Luxembourg → Belgium → Netherlands → Germany

Picked up a car and road-tripped through Stuttgart, Baden-Baden, Metz, Luxembourg City, Brussels, Amsterdam, Zandvoort (Formula 1), Düsseldorf, Nürburg (Nürburgring), Mannheim, and back to Stuttgart.

July – Boston, Massachusetts, USA

Family trip with whale watching and exploring the city.

February – Ellicottville, New York, USA

Friends ski trip.

2022

November – Texas, USA

Attended my cousin’s wedding.

February – Cancun, Mexico

Group grad trip.

February – New York City, USA

Solo trip for fun.

January – Texas, USA

Visited for my cousin’s engagement.
